item.title: Live Unit Testing in Visual Studio 2017
item.description: I am a big proponent of unit testing my code because of the many benefits it provides: Helps me to catch potential bugs early Helps me to clarify the behavior of my units (classes) from a client perspective Leaves a documentation trail for those that come behind me to understand my intentions The only irritation/friction I have found in the past is the fact that running unit tests has required me to manually run them on a periodic basis.

TODD A. MEINERSHAGEN 1850 Countryside Dr., Frisco, TX 75034 Home 972.712.2771 â€¢ Cellular 972.343.8652 todd@meinershagen.net
SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATIONS Accomplished architect with 17+ years of in-depth, hands-on experience designing and developing service-oriented, n-tier applications to solve business problems. Diverse certifications MCSD.NET Profession Scrum Master I MongoDB for Node.JS Developers and DBAs Certificate for Java Development Team player with a consistent history of “Far Exceeds” rating for end of year reviews.

item.title: About
item.description: Todd Meinershagen Summary Accomplished architect with 20+ years of in-depth, hands-on experience designing and developing service-oriented, n-tier applications to solve business problems. Love working with people, improving process, learning new technologies/techniques and generating ideas while striving for excellence in everything that I do. Teacher’s heart and a diligent passion to accomplish. Specialties Agile Process Process Engineering In-depth Systems/Tools Knowledge Technology Architecture and Design Experience Senior Software Architect
